sect2.title: Command explanations
sect2.para: --prefix=&kde-dir; : This option tells the process to install the package in &kde-dir;. We put aRts here because this package is required before installing KDE.
--disable-debug : This option causes the system to be compiled without debugging code.
--disable-dependency-tracking : This option speeds up one time builds.

ln -sfn kde-&kde-version; /opt/kde : This parameter creates a link for access to KDE. If a newer version of KDE is released, the new system can be built by changing the --prefix location and then set up by changing the link as this parameter does.
